column3: Kind Words (lo fi chill beats to write to)
column19: everything is balanced just right. I think it's one of the all-time greats, right up there with Tetris. Every turn is an incredibly fun and engaging puzzle in and of itself. Deciding unit movement, attack type, responding to enemy actions, balancing short-term and long-term goals, sacrificing infrastructure or units, picking the right upgrades for the task -- the game gives you so many interesting decisions to think about without it feeling overwhelming. I could go on and on, but the gameplay really speaks for itself. Give it a try. You probably won't be disappointed."
